lines.text: He's drowning himself because I hid his cigarettes.

[about Melissa the ghost who Geno sees for the first time]
She's looking for her mother.
Got her number? Lets call her.

[Frankie knees Geno in the groin]
Quick! Call a doctor!

[after Donald mocking Frankie for liking a girl, Frankie knocking him out with a punch to the face]
Gee, wish I were in love...
